Articles.Content:
I don't know why, but for some reason, the Mrk 16 chute that deploys is pink. It is probably a graphic mod, but still, please help with this!

An example can be found at 1:16

Edited January 9, 2023 by Spacedoge402
the link wasn't working
Your link isn't a link, it just looks like one but doesn't link to anything.
I fixed the link, and it can be seen in the video I made at 1:16
Need a list of mods you have installed.

Here it the mod list link:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rgKLmUa5oB-zb-lv_J0O25XHqaAFAkqXEGyDIcAtXzQ/edit

Also, is there anything else I missed?
It's a missing texture, which could probably be identified by going through the log file.

As already said, the log file would be useful. The only thing in your mod list that I know modifies the parachute is "Shaddy". It adds a translucent shader to parachutes (and other parts).

It works for me, though.
Thank you for telling me this. I won't use shaddy anymore because I'm to lazy to fi this.
